content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)

### Coal Mining and Distribution System at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -83.5) connected to the mining drill
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -83.5) and (42.5, -83.5) for coal storage
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -80.5) for transferring coal
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) for additional coal storage
- BeltGroup connecting positions (42.5, -83.5) to (45.5, -83.5) for coal transport

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors due to insufficient fuel in furnaces
- Regularly check and refuel furnaces to prevent production halts due to lack of fuel.

### Errors due to furnaces having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure a consistent supply of raw materials to furnaces to maintain production flow.
